0: Breakfast evening reception offers Indoor Pool Friendly Staff Mini fridge microwave
I enjoyed the sound of the water feature but sound seems to carry throughout the atrium and into the rooms including the sound of screaming children
Amenities are nice managers reception in the evening is friendly
The complimentary reception and breakfasts are great
My children enjoyed the macaw in the lobby and also the pool
Complimentary evening reception was very nice
Breakfast and evening reception are both great valet parking garage attendants were so courteous and prompt
Breakfast was wonderful as well as the Managers reception
1: The hotel was clean but a little noisy because of lobby renovations
I would definitely stay here again just hope the next time lobby is finished
Breakfast was moved to one of the ballrooms more on that in a moment
The hotel was under renovation but they provided a very good breakfast and reception in the evenings
Rooms are great but we were there during refurbishment and the foyer was a mess
Hotel was going through renovation and tons of construction equipment were all over
But we were not notified that the lobby was undergoing substantial upgrade construction so the pleasant atmosphere of the enormous Embassy atrium was useless
Since this is also the lobby breakfast room evening reception and check in they have had to relocate all these areas
managers reception even had a pretty decent local craft brew for free as well which was nice
2: The entrance from the south is a little confusing and further complicated by slow elevators
I called the front desk and they allowed us to get some snacks in lobby but they were n’t comparable to mine
We had very loud neighbors and a very biligerent lady in lobby when we came down to purchase our drinks
Hallways were not clean with dirty dishes throughout

The breakfast was cold Plus there were children running and screaming up and down the halls not being supervised at all and at breakfast they would run in pushing you out of the way to go and pull the bread and bagels out with their bare hands to pick one from the back
No info on breakfast time manager reception just not helpful
no signs in the lobby just a small lobby I had no idea where to go
After 3 calls and no TP we finally found a maid in the hallway who gave us a roll
Rooms need to be updated to match the lobby and hotel area
Not ideal especially when there is so much more to look at in the glass elevators
